english.segment1: Hearts broke. When your heart stopped beating. I don't. Know if mine will ever stop bleeding
english.segment2: Eleven minutes.. To breathe you in. I felt the darkness. When I knew I couldn't hold you again. When I knew I couldn't hold you again
english.segment3: Olivianna, you're in the arms of God. Just a moment there is better than here
english.segment4: Life is short but it is wide. I know it's true. You touched more souls. Than most people ever do
english.segment5: Olivianna, you're in the arms of God. Just a moment there is better than here
english.segment6: You could not stay with us (echoed). We will come to you (echoed). You could not stay with us (echoed). Oh oh oh oh. You're going home love. Where you belong. Oh my baby, girl. I'll see you soon
english.segment7: Olivianna, you're in the arms of God. Just a moment there is better than here. Olivianna, you're in the arms of God. Just a moment there is better than here
